O_NAMA_HEADER: Everything you need to know about us and our history!
O_NAMA_02: We have been pleasing customers since day one
O_NAMA_03: We provide restaurant owners with a quick and easy way to advertise the restaurant with its offer. We provide users with a quick and easy insight into restaurant offers, as well as the possibility of ordering and delivery 24/7. We leave the assessment of the quality of the restaurant to our customers with review mechanism. For those of an experimental nature, we have a diverse offer of different types of cuisine, and for those who like to enjoy their favorite products, we have a quick and easy way to add products to favorites, as well as to repeat an order.
O_NAMA_05: Our services are available to you 24 hours a day, free delievery in every part of town. We openly recieve all ideas and complaints via our e-mail.
O_NAMA_07: We serve fresh and natural based food. Our restaurants deliever best products for best customers.
O_NAMA_10: The idea for the development of the platform came to life in the first half of 2014, when a group of young developers motivated by the lack of a virtual food offer decided to provide everyone with a quick and easy way to their favorite products. The first office from which it all started was the garage of one of the developers. With little resources, but a lot of will and commitment, the first version of the burger bite was released on February 2nd.
O_NAMA_12: Two years after the release of the first version of the app, we first felt an explosion in demand. That year, the platform became relatively accepted by our clients, which enabled us to open the first real office in Split.
O_NAMA_14: June 7 we opened our first office outside of Croatia. We decided to settle in Bulgaria, Sofia. That day the history was written and many bellies were full. Our brand became to expand across whole Balkan with our new drive-in system and 24/7 delivery service.
O_NAMA_16: Today we own more than 5 offices across 3 balkan countries and we are well known and worldly acceptable brand. We have vast variety of restaurants and unique system of delivery and serving food for our customers.

KONTAKTIRAJTE_NAS_HEADER: Have request or complient? Feel free to contact us!
KONTAKTIRAJTE_NAS_01: ALL OUR LOCATIONS AT YOUR HAND!
KONTAKTIRAJTE_NAS_02: We are always ready to welcome you with our great employees and cozy atmosphere.
KONTAKTIRAJTE_NAS_03: Find us at these locations and we will make sure your visit stays remembered forever.
KONTAKTIRAJTE_NAS_04: You don't know how our offices look like? Find one you like the most at our social media.
FAVORITI_HEADER: Store your favourite products for quick access
POCETNA_01: The most extensive offer of restaurants of different types of cuisine. From fast food through Mexican delicacies to vegan specialties all in one place.
POCETNA_02: Burger bite provides the possibility of advertising to all restaurant owners, as well as the possibility of ordering for the users themselves. With fast delivery and a diverse offer of restaurants, we also provide customers with the possibility of evaluation, as well as leaving opinion for the advertised restaurants. We provide quick access to all your favorite products, as well as the ability to re-order your favorite combinations.
POCETNA_04: Free delivery at your doorsteps 24/7. Our customer service is always available for your requests. Every suggestion is welcome and you can send it via e-mail.
POCETNA_06: Find us on social media platforms. See latest updates and photos of our products. Stay in trend with your favourite fast food.
